SamPy.image.ImageConvolution.Convolve¶

SamPy.image.ImageConvolution.Convolve(image1, image2, MinPad=True, pad=True)¶

Convolves image1 with image2.

Parameters:
  • image1 – 2D image array
  • image2 – 2D image array
  • MinPad – whether to use minimal padding
  • pad – whether to pad the array
